page.title: 05Vicars Interview continued.
page.content: { What kinds of social activities are {there?} There are many social activities linked with fund raising.For example a May Day fair,fetes for fund raising, garden parties,Harvest festivals, Christmas bonanzas,coffee mornings etc .Also a youth club,mother's union and a women's institute. {Does the Church play an important {part in the life of the people here?} It has in general and the social activities give me a chance to talk to the people in the community,especially the elderly because they always want someone to talk to for company.However ,I do not think it affects people here a great deal because only a tiny percentage come to church. {Has Upleadon changed much and how {much new building work is done?} Occasionally a family has built a
